name: Samsung MDC
info:
# Samsung MDC Protocol
available [online](https://aca.im/driver_docs/Samsung/MDC%20Protocol%202015%20v13.7c.pdf) over different providers. Seams like Samsung does not provide it directly.

## How to use
### Input
 - Set Host, Port, MAC and ID of the device in the environement variables of the subflow node (click on the i symbol)
 - Give in a Command as msg.topic String `"0xYY"` any Hexcode declared in the Protocol.
 - Declare any Value targeted as Data1.. in the Protocol as Payload String `"0xYY"`or Array of Strings.

### Output
 - Expect the full response as msg.payload.response.
 - id as msg.payload.id
 - command as msg.payload.command
 - All Values get exponated in msg.payload.response.values[]

## Specialites
Power needs to be triggerd as Wake on Lan 3 times within 2s if the display is in Power Off status. This is done inside the subnode regardless the status anytime a `NAK` after power on (`0x11`) arrives.


Example flow:
`[
    {
        "id": "39374379.e31f4c",
        "type": "subflow",
        "name": "Samsung MDC (2)",
        "info": "# Samsung MDC Protocol
available [online](https://aca.im/driver_docs/Samsung/MDC%20Protocol%202015%20v13.7c.pdf).

## how to use
### input
 - Set Host, Port, MAC and ID of the device in the environement variables of the subflow node (click on the i symbol)
 - Give in a Command as msg.topic String `"0xYY"` any Hexcode declared in the Protocol.
 - Declare any Value targeted as Data1.. in the Protocol as Payload String `"0xYY"`or Array of Strings.

### output
 - Expect the full response as msg.payload.response.
 - id as msg.payload.id
 - command as msg.payload.command
 - All Values get exponated in msg.payload.response.values[]

## Specialites
Power needs to be triggerd as Wake on Lan 3 times within 2s if the display is in Power Off status. This is done inside the subnode regardless the status anytime a `NAK` after power on (`0x11`) arrives.


Example flow:
```[
    {
        "id": "721b0fbe.8c39e",
        "type": "subflow",
        "name": "Samsung MDC",
        "info": "# Samsung MDC Protocol\navailable [online](https://aca.im/driver_docs/Samsung/MDC%20Protocol%202015%20v13.7c.pdf).\n\n## how to use\n### input\n - Set Host, Port, MAC and ID of the device in the environement variables of the subflow node (click on the i symbol)\n - Give in a Command as msg.topic String `\"0xYY\"` any Hexcode declared in the Protocol.\n - Declare any Value targeted as Data1.. in the Protocol as Payload String `\"0xYY\"`or Array of Strings.\n\n### output\n - Expect the full response as msg.payload.response.\n - id as msg.payload.id\n - command as msg.payload.command\n - All Values get exponated in msg.payload.response.values[]\n\n## Specialites\nPower needs to be triggerd as Wake on Lan 3 times within 2s if the display is in Power Off status. This is done inside the subnode regardless the status anytime a `NAK` after power on (`0x11`) arrives.",
        "category": "",
        "in": [
            {
                "x": 60,
                "y": 100,
                "wires": [
                    {
                        "id": "5f07fe4e.7b1b4"
                    }
                ]
            }
        ],
        "out": [
            {
                "x": 2700,
                "y": 40,
                "wires": [
                    {
                        "id": "ca2d05c8.1f9178",
                        "port": 0
                    }
                ]
            },
            {
                "x": 2700,
                "y": 80,
                "wires": [
                    {
                        "id": "32fd9576.38cdaa",
                        "port": 0
                    }
                ]
            }
        ],
        "env": [
            {
                "name": "MAC",
                "type": "str",
                "value": ""
            },
            {
                "name": "Host",
                "type": "str",
                "value": ""
            },
            {
                "name": "Port",
                "type": "num",
                "value": "1515"
            },
            {
                "name": "Screen ID",
                "type": "num",
                "value": ""
            }
        ],
        "color": "#3FADB5",
        "outputLabels": [
            "response",
            "errorcode"
        ],
        "icon": "node-red-node-wol/onoff.png",
        "status": {
            "x": 2700,
            "y": 160,
            "wires": [
                {
                    "id": "19ea9eee.a224c1",
                    "port": 0
                },
                {
                    "id": "32fd9576.38cdaa",
                    "port": 0
                },
                {
                    "id": "1b4f5b0e.11c705",
                    "port": 0
                }
            ]
        }
    },
    {
        "id": "5483af31.0ea2d",
        "type": "function",
        "z": "721b0fbe.8c39e",
        "name": "request creation",
        "func": "// MDC protocol:     Header,Command, ID,   Datalength, Data1, Checksum\n// Example Power ON: 0xAA,  0x11,    0x01, 0x01,       0x01,  0x14]);\n\nconst header = 0xAA;\nlet command = parseInt(msg.topic,16);\nlet id = parseInt(msg.id,16);\nlet message = [];\nmessage.push(header, command, id)\nlet data_sum = 0;\nlet datalength = 0;\nlet value = msg.payload;\nif (value === false){\n    message.push(datalength);\n} else if (Array.isArray(value)){\n    datalength = value.length\n    value.forEach(function(data){\n        let d = parseInt(data,16)\n        message.push(datalength,d);\n        data_sum += d;\n    });\n} else {\n    datalength = 1\n    let d = parseInt(value,16)\n    message.push(datalength,d);\n    data_sum += d;\n}\nlet checksum = command + id + datalength + data_sum;\nmessage.push(checksum);\nmsg.payload = new Buffer(message);\nmsg.request = {\n    'host':msg.host,\n    'port':msg.port,\n    'id':msg.id,\n    'topic':msg.topic,\n    'value':value,\n    'payload':msg.payload\n}\nreturn msg;",
        "outputs": 1,
        "noerr": 0,
        "initialize": "",
        "finalize": "",
        "x": 700,
        "y": 60,
        "wires": [
            [
                "30335085.8ba44"
            ]
        ]
    },
    {
        "id": "2d697c27.744534",
        "type": "wake on lan",
        "z": "721b0fbe.8c39e",
        "mac": "",
        "host": "",
        "udpport": 9,
        "name": "",
        "x": 2650,
        "y": 260,
        "wires": []
    },
    {
        "id": "5f07fe4e.7b1b4",
        "type": "function",
        "z": "721b0fbe.8c39e",
        "name": "if (topic) isHex:true|false",
        "func": "function isHex(h) {\n    var a = parseInt(h,16);\n    if (a.toString(16).length === 1){\n        return (('0x0'+a.toString(16)) === h.toLowerCase())\n    } else {\n        return (('0x'+a.toString(16)) === h.toLowerCase())\n    }\n}\nif (isHex(msg.topic)){\n    return [msg,null]\n}else{\n    return [null, msg]\n}",
        "outputs": 2,
        "noerr": 0,
        "initialize": "",
        "finalize": "",
        "x": 230,
        "y": 100,
        "wires": [
            [
                "b60b67eb.8b5368"
            ],
            [
                "19ea9eee.a224c1"
            ]
        ]
    },
    {
        "id": "30335085.8ba44",
        "type": "tcp request",
        "z": "721b0fbe.8c39e",
        "server": "",
        "port": "",
        "out": "time",
        "splitc": "1900",
        "name": "",
        "x": 890,
        "y": 60,
        "wires": [
            [
                "ebe4e7c6.32f028"
            ]
        ]
    },
    {
        "id": "19ea9eee.a224c1",
        "type": "change",
        "z": "721b0fbe.8c39e",
        "name": "error not valid hex topic",
        "rules": [
            {
                "t": "set",
                "p": "payload",
                "pt": "msg",
                "to": "Topic not a valid hex number. \\n Declare as type string and 0x00 format. ",
                "tot": "str"
            }
        ],
        "action": "",
        "property": "",
        "from": "",
        "to": "",
        "reg": false,
        "x": 510,
        "y": 140,
        "wires": [
            []
        ]
    },
    {
        "id": "ca2d05c8.1f9178",
        "type": "function",
        "z": "721b0fbe.8c39e",
        "name": "response",
        "func": "msg.response = {};\nif (msg.payload[5].toString(16).length === 1){\n    msg.response.command = '0x0'+msg.payload[5].toString(16);\n} else {\n    msg.response.command = '0x'+msg.payload[5].toString(16);\n}\nmsg.response.count = (parseInt(msg.payload[3],16)-2);\nmsg.response.val = []\nfor(let i = 1; i <= msg.response.count; i++){\n    index = 5 + i\n    if (msg.payload[index].toString(16).length === 1){\n        msg.response.val[i] = '0x0'+msg.payload[index].toString(16)\n    } else {\n        msg.response.val[i] = '0x'+msg.payload[index].toString(16)\n    }\n}\nreturn msg;",
        "outputs": 1,
        "noerr": 0,
        "initialize": "",
        "finalize": "",
        "x": 1860,
        "y": 40,
        "wires": [
            []
        ]
    },
    {
        "id": "a63d8c50.2d0f5",
        "type": "switch",
        "z": "721b0fbe.8c39e",
        "name": "response command 0xFF",
        "property": "payload[1]",
        "propertyType": "msg",
        "rules": [
            {
                "t": "eq",
                "v": "255",
                "vt": "num"
            }
        ],
        "checkall": "true",
        "repair": false,
        "outputs": 1,
        "x": 1330,
        "y": 60,
        "wires": [
            [
                "2e75b8b8.ae0c98"
            ]
        ]
    },
    {
        "id": "2e75b8b8.ae0c98",
        "type": "switch",
        "z": "721b0fbe.8c39e",
        "name": "response command ACK|NAK",
        "property": "payload[4]",
        "propertyType": "msg",
        "rules": [
            {
                "t": "eq",
                "v": "65",
                "vt": "num"
            },
            {
                "t": "eq",
                "v": "78",
                "vt": "num"
            }
        ],
        "checkall": "true",
        "repair": false,
        "outputs": 2,
        "x": 1610,
        "y": 60,
        "wires": [

                "ca2d05c8.1f9178"
            ],
            [
                "8bbd972e.dfaba8"
            ]
        ]
    },
    {
        "id": "32fd9576.38cdaa",

        "z": "721b0fbe.8c39e",
        "name": "errorcode",
        "rules": [
            {
                "t": "set",
                "p": "payload",

            },
            {
                "t": "set",
                "p": "response.val[1]",

                "tot": "jsonata"
            }
        ],
        "action": "",
        "property": "",

        "action": "",

        "from": "",

    {

    {
        "id": "388e8eff.666892",
        "type": "function",
        "z": "61a52bac.14f714",
        "name": "",
        "func": "if(msg.response.command === '0x0d'){\n    msg.temperature_C = parseInt(msg.response.val[5])\n} else if (msg.response.command === '0x00'){\n    msg.power = parseInt(msg.response.val[1])\n    msg.volume = parseInt(msg.response.val[2])\n    msg.mute = parseInt(msg.response.val[3])\n    if (msg.response.val[4] === \"0x21\"){\n        msg.in = 'HDMI1'\n    } else if (msg.response.val[4] === \"0x23\"){\n        msg.in = 'HDMI2'\n    } \n    msg.aspect = parseInt(msg.response.val[5])\n}\nreturn msg;",
        "outputs": 1,
        "noerr": 0,
        "initialize": "",
        "finalize": "",
        "x": 1660,
        "y": 4460,
        "wires": [
            [
                "53ea2ab2.a35174"
            ]
        ]
    }
]```",

    {
        "id": "459752a4.5e8c2c",
        "type": "function",
        "z": "39374379.e31f4c",
        "name": "request creation",
        "func": "// MDC protocol:     Header,Command, ID,   Datalength, Data1, Checksum
// Example Power ON: 0xAA,  0x11,    0x01, 0x01,       0x01,  0x14]);

const header = 0xAA;
let command = parseInt(msg.topic,16);
let id = parseInt(msg.id,16);
let message = [];
message.push(header, command, id)
let data_sum = 0;
let datalength = 0;
let value = msg.payload;
if (value === false){
    message.push(datalength);
} else if (Array.isArray(value)){
    datalength = value.length
    value.forEach(function(data){
        let d = parseInt(data,16)
        message.push(datalength,d);
        data_sum += d;
    });
} else {
    datalength = 1
    let d = parseInt(value,16)
    message.push(datalength,d);
    data_sum += d;
}
let checksum = command + id + datalength + data_sum;
message.push(checksum);
msg.payload = new Buffer(message);
msg.request = {
    'host':msg.host,
    'port':msg.port,
    'id':msg.id,
    'topic':msg.topic,
    'value':value,
    'payload':msg.payload
}
return msg;",

        "id": "e87afdbf.69597",

    {
        "id": "620fa9a0.6290e8",
        "type": "function",
        "z": "39374379.e31f4c",
        "name": "if (topic) isHex:true|false",
        "func": "function isHex(h) {
    var a = parseInt(h,16);
    if (a.toString(16).length === 1){
        return (('0x0'+a.toString(16)) === h.toLowerCase())
    } else {
        return (('0x'+a.toString(16)) === h.toLowerCase())
    }
}
if (isHex(msg.topic)){
    return [msg,null]
}else{
    return [null, msg]
}",

        "id": "90abec12.d2034",
        "type": "change",
        "z": "39374379.e31f4c",
        "name": "error not valid hex topic",
        "rules": [
            {
                "t": "set",
                "p": "payload",
                "pt": "msg",
                "to": "Topic not a valid hex number. \n Declare as type string and 0x00 format. ",
                "tot": "str"
            }
        ],
        "action": "",

    {
        "id": "6850b007.741de",
        "type": "function",
        "z": "39374379.e31f4c",
        "name": "response",
        "func": "msg.response = {};
if (msg.payload[5].toString(16).length === 1){
    msg.response.command = '0x0'+msg.payload[5].toString(16);
} else {
    msg.response.command = '0x'+msg.payload[5].toString(16);
}
msg.response.count = (parseInt(msg.payload[3],16)-2);
msg.response.val = []
for(let i = 1; i <= msg.response.count; i++){
    index = 5 + i
    if (msg.payload[index].toString(16).length === 1){
        msg.response.val[i] = '0x0'+msg.payload[index].toString(16)
    } else {
        msg.response.val[i] = '0x'+msg.payload[index].toString(16)
    }
}
return msg;",

    {
        "id": "2716b928.389866",
        "type": "subflow:39374379.e31f4c",
        "z": "763b9945.a3a2e8",
        "name": "Samsung MDC",
        "env": [
            {
                "name": "Screen ID",
                "value": "0",
                "type": "num"
            }
        ],
        "x": 760,
        "y": 900,
        "wires": [
            [
                "80bfbab6.a34898"
            ],
            [
                "212d9b6a.d2b944"
            ]
        ]
    },
    {
        "id": "80bfbab6.a34898",
        "type": "function",
        "z": "763b9945.a3a2e8",
        "name": "sanitize response",
        "func": "if (msg.response.command === '0x11'){
    if (msg.response.val[1] === "0x01"){
        msg.power = "ON"
    } else if (msg.response.val[1] === "0x00"){
        msg.power = "OFF"
    }
} else if (msg.response.command === '0x14'){
    if (msg.response.val[1] === "0x21"){
        msg.in = 'HDMI1'
    } else if (msg.response.val[1] === "0x23"){
        msg.in = 'HDMI2'
    }
} else if(msg.response.command === '0x0d'){
    msg.temperature_C = parseInt(msg.response.val[5])
} else if (msg.response.command === '0x00'){
    if (msg.response.val[1] === "0x01"){
        msg.power = "ON"
    } else if (msg.response.val[1] === "0x00"){
        msg.power = "OFF"
    }
    msg.volume = parseInt(msg.response.val[2])
    if (msg.response.val[3] === "0x01"){
        msg.mute = "ON"
    } else if (msg.response.val[3] === "0x00"){
        msg.mute = "OFF"
    }
    if (msg.response.val[4] === "0x21"){
        msg.in = 'HDMI1'
    } else if (msg.response.val[4] === "0x23"){
        msg.in = 'HDMI2'
    }
    switch(msg.response.val[5]){
        case '0x10':
            msg.aspect = 'PC Mode 16:9';
            break;
        case '0x18':
            msg.aspect = 'PC Mode 4:3';
            break;
        case '0x20':
            msg.aspect = 'PC Mode Original Ratio';
            break;
        case '0x21':
            msg.aspect = 'PC Mode 21:9';
            break;
        case '0x00':
            msg.aspect = 'Auto Wide';
            break;
        case '0x01':
            msg.aspect = '16:9';
            break;
        case '0x04':
            msg.aspect = 'Zoom';
            break;
        case '0x05':
            msg.aspect = 'Zoom 1';
            break;
        case '0x06':
            msg.aspect = 'Zoom 2';
            break;
        case '0x09':
            msg.aspect = 'Screen Fit';
            break;
        case '0x0B':
            msg.aspect = '4:3';
            break;
        case '0x0C':
            msg.aspect = 'Wide Fit';
            break;
        case '0x0D':
            msg.aspect = 'Custom';
            break;
        case '0x0E':
            msg.aspect = 'Smart View 1';
            break;
        case '0x0F':
            msg.aspect = 'Smart View 2';
            break;
        case '0x31':
            msg.aspect = 'Wide Zoom';
            break;
        case '0x32':
            msg.aspect = '21:9';
            break;
    }
}
return msg;",
        "outputs": 1,
        "noerr": 0,
        "initialize": "",
        "finalize": "",
        "x": 1030,
        "y": 880,
        "wires": [
            [
                "e20b5749.16ce88"
            ]
        ]
    }
]`

if (topic) isHex:true|false

rules.to: Topic not a valid hex number. \n Declare as type string and 0x00 format.

flow.name: response
